Subject: About Hot Rod
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

"Well, I grew up on Cybertron. I was an Autobot. I was at Autobot City
when Optimus Prime died. I ended up useing the Matrix, to destroy
Unicron. I lead the Autobots for two years as Rodimus Prime. I was one
of the first Target Masters. After the great upgrade, I was rebuilt as a
Maxi, and explored space. When I came back to Cybertron, I learned of
the Neo Beast Wars, and came here."
